gen:link.msg:message: "Date of financial statements approved by Board of Directors" MUST be reported.
Tarikh penyata kewangan yang diluluskan oleh Lembaga Pengarah MESTI dilaporkan.
"Date of financial statements approved by Board of Directors" MUST be greater than "Company's current financial year end date"
Tarikh penyata kewangan yang diluluskan oleh Lembaga Pengarah MESTILAH lebih besar daripada "Tarikh akhir tahun kewangan semasa syarikat"
"Date of circulation of financial statements and reports to members" MUST be reported.
Tarikh edaran penyata kewangan dan laporan kepada ahli MESTI dilaporkan.
"Date of circulation of financial statements and reports to members" must be equal to or greater than "Date of financial statements approved by Board of Directors"
Tarikh edaran penyata kewangan dan laporan kepada ahli mestilah sama atau lebih besar daripada "Tarikh penyata kewangan yang diluluskan oleh Lembaga Pengarah"
When user selects "Status of company" as "Public company" THEN "Date of financial statements and reports of the directors and auditors (if applicable) laid in annual general meeting" MUST be reported

Apabila pengguna memilih "Status syarikat" sebagai "Public Company" KEMUDIAN "Tarikh penyata kewangan dan laporan pengarah dan juruaudit (jika berkenaan) dibentangkan dalam mesyuarat agung tahunan" MESTI dilaporkan
"Date of Statutory Declaration" MUST be reported.
Tarikh Akuan Berkanun MESTI dilaporkan.
When filer selects "Description on whether company had applied to waive lodgement of financial statements by foreign company" as "Yes" THEN "Date of Statutory Declaration" MUST be reported.

Apabila pemfail memilih "Penerangan sama ada syarikat telah memohon untuk pengenepian serah simpan penyata kewangan oleh syarikat asing" sebagai "Ya" KEMUDIAN "Tarikh Akuan Berkanun" MESTI dilaporkan.
"Date of Statutory Declaration" MUST be greater than "Company's current financial year end date"
Tarikh Akuan Berkanun MESTILAH lebih besar daripada "Tarikh akhir tahun kewangan semasa syarikat"
When filer selects "Type of company" as "Unlimted companies" THEN "Disclosure of the regulation applied during incorporation of the company" should be "Companies Act 1965 or 2016"
Apabila pemfail memilih "Jenis syarikat" sebagai "Unlimited company" KEMUDIAN "Pendedahan berkenaan akta yang diguna pakai semasa pemerbadanan" hendaklah "Companies Act 1965 or 2016"
"MSIC Code" MUST be reported
Kod MSIC MESTI dilaporkan.
"Description of Business" MUST be reported.
Perihalan Perniagaan MESTI dilaporkan
"Disclosure on whether comparative period values are restated" MUST be reported
Pendedahan sama ada terdapat nilai yang dinyatakan semula dalam tahun perbandingan MESTI dilaporkan
"Disclosure on whether opening statements changed due to changes in accounting standards" MUST be reported
Pendedahan sama ada penyata pembukaan berubah disebabkan oleh perubahan dalam piawaian perakaunan MESTI dilaporkan
"Disclosure on whether reclassification of previous financial statements changed due to changes in accounting standards" MUST be reported
Pendedahan sama ada pengkelasan semula penyata kewangan terdahulu berubah disebabkan oleh perubahan dalam piawaian perakaunan MESTI dilaporkan
"Description on whether company changed the duration of financial reporting period" MUST be reported
Penerangan sama ada syarikat mengubah tempoh pelaporan kewangan MESTI dilaporkan
"Disclosure of auditor's statement (text block)" MUST be reported
Pendedahan pernyataan juruaudit kepada ahli [teks blok] MESTI dilaporkan
"Disclosure on whether company has kept proper accounting reports and other books during the financial period" MUST be reported
Pendedahan sama ada syarikat telah menyimpan laporan perakaunan dan buku lain yang sewajarnya semasa tempoh kewangan MESTI dilaporkan
"Type of auditor's opinion" MUST be reported
Jenis pendapat juruaudit MESTI dilaporkan
"Date of signing auditor's report" MUST be reported
Tarikh menandatangani laporan juruaudit MESTI dilaporkan
"Date of signing auditor's report" MUST be greater than "Company's current financial year end date"
Tarikh laporan juruaudit ditandatangan MESTILAH lebih besar daripada "Tarikh akhir tahun kewangan semasa syarikat"
"License number of auditor" MUST be reported
Nombor lesen juruaudit MESTI dilaporkan
"Name of auditor signing report MUST be reported
Nama juruaudit yang menandatangani laporan MESTI dilaporkan
"Registration number of audit firm" MUST be reported
Nombor pendaftaran firma audit MESTI dilaporkan
"Name of audit firm MUST be reported
Nama firma audit MESTI dilaporkan
"Address 1" MUST be reported
Alamat 1 MESTI dilaporkan
"Postcode" MUST be reported
Poskod MESTI dilaporkan
"State" MUST be reported
Negeri MESTI dilaporkan
"Town" MUST be reported
Bandar MESTI dilaporkan
"Disclosure of the status as an exempt private company (text block)" MUST be reported
Pendedahan status sebagai syarikat persendirian terkecuali [blok teks] MESTI dilaporkan
"Disclosure on whether company is and has at all relevant time been an exempted private company" MUST be reported
Pendedahan sama ada syarikat itu dan pada setiap masa yang berkaitan merupakan suatu syarikat persendirian terkecuali MESTI dilaporkan
"Disclosure on whether a duly audited financial statements reports required under Companies Act 2016 has been circulate to its members" MUST be reported
Pendedahan sama ada penyata kewangan dan laporan teraudit yang sewajarnya yang dikehendaki di bawah Akta Syarikat 2016 telah diedarkan kepada ahlinya MESTI dilaporkan

"Disclosure on whether as at the date to which the financial statement has been made up, the company appeared to have been able to meet its liabilities as and when the liabilities fall due" MUST be reported
Pendedahan sama ada pada tarikh penyata kewangan itu dibuat, syarikat itu ternyata berupaya menganggung liabilitinya jika dan apabila ia perlu dibayar MESTI dilaporkan
"Name of director who signed certificate of exempt private company" MUST be reported
Nama pengarah yang menandatangani perakuan berhubung syarikat persendirian terkecuali MESTI dilaporkan
"Type of identification of director who signed certificate of exempt private company" MUST be reported
Jenis pengenalan diri pengarah yang menandatangani perakuan berhubung syarikat persendirian terkecuali MESTI dilaporkan
"Identification number of the director who signed certificate of exempt private company" MUST be reported
Nombor pengenalan pengarah yang menandatangani perakuan berhubung syarikat persendirian terkecuali MESTI dilaporkan
"Name of company secretary who signed certificate of exempt private company" MUST be reported
Nama setiausaha syarikat yang menandatangani perakuan berhubung syarikat persendirian terkecuali MESTI dilaporkan
"Type of identification of company secretary who signed certificate of exempt private company" MUST be reported
Jenis pengenalan diri setiausaha syarikat yang menandatangani perakuan berhubung syarikat persendirian terkecuali MESTI dilaporkan
"Identification number of the company secretary who signed certificate of exempt private company" MUST be reported
Nombor pengenalan setiausaha syarikat yang menandatangani perakuan berhubung syarikat persendirian terkecuali MESTI dilaporkan
"Name of the auditor who signed certificate of exempt private company" MUST be reported
Nama juruaudit yang menandatangani perakuan berhubung syarikat persendirian terkecuali MESTI dilaporkan
"Date of the exempt private company certificate" MUST be reported
Tarikh syarikat persendirian terkecuali diperakukan MESTI dilaporkan
"Date of the exempt private company certificate" should be greater than "Company current financial year end date"
Tarikh syarikat persendirian terkecuali diperakukan "Tarikh akhir tahun kewangan semasa syarikat"
When filer selects "Type of submission" as "FS-EPC" and "Status of company" as "Private company" THEN "Disclosure of financial statements audit status" should be "Audited"
Apabila pemfail memilih "Jenis serahan" sebagai "FS-EPC" dan "Status syarikat" sebagai "Private company" KEMUDIAN "Pendedahan status audit penyata kewangan" hendaklah "Audited"
Disclosure on whether any director provided guarantee to give financial support if the company insolvent MUST be reported
Pendedahan sama ada mana-mana pengarah memberi jaminan untuk memberikan sokongan kewangan jika syarikat tidak solven MESTI dilaporkan
Disclosure on type of guarantee provided by director MUST be reported
Pendedahan mengenai jenis jaminan yang disediakan oleh pengarah MESTI dilaporkan
Company Secretary Practising Certificate No. MUST be reported
Nombor Perakuan Amalan Setiausaha Syarikat MESTI dilaporkan
When filer selects "Disclosure on whether company's shares are traded on any official stock exchange" as "Listed" THEN "Status of company" should be "Public company"
Apabila pemfail memilih "Pendedahan sama ada saham syarikat diniagakan di mana-mana bursa saham rasmi" sebagai "Listed" KEMUDIAN "Status syarikat" hendaklah "Public company"
When filer selects "Disclosure on whether company's shares are traded on any official stock exchange" as "Not-listed" THEN "Status of company" should be "Private company"
Apabila pemfail memilih "Pendedahan sama ada saham syarikat diniagakan di mana-mana bursa saham rasmi" sebagai "Not-listed" KEMUDIAN "Status syarikat" hendaklah "Private company
When filer selects "Disclosure on whether company's shares are traded on any official stock exchange" as "Delisted" THEN "Status of company" should be "Private company"
Apabila pemfail memilih "Pendedahan sama ada saham syarikat diniagakan di mana-mana bursa saham rasmi" sebagai "Delisted" KEMUDIAN "Status syarikat" hendaklah "Private company"

When filer selects "Description on whether company had applied for any exemption, waiver, relief or extension of time with regards to annual return or financial statements and reports from Registrar or Minister" as "Yes" THEN "Description on whether company had applied for exemption from coinciding foreign subsidiary financial year end with holding company" MUST be reported.

Apabila pemfail memilih "Penerangan sama ada syarikat telah memohon sebarang pengecualian, pengenepian atau pelanjutan masa berkaitan dengan penyata tahunan atau penyata kewangan dan laporan daripada Pendaftar atau Menteri" sebagai "Ya" KEMUDIAN "Penerangan sama ada syarikat telah memohon pengecualian daripada keseragamaan tahun kewangan berakhir subidiari syarikat asing dengan syarikat induk." MESTI dilaporkan.

When filer selects "Description on whether company had applied for any exemption, waiver, relief or extension of time with regards to annual return or financial statements and reports from Registrar or Minister" as "Yes" THEN "Description on whether company had applied from filing financial statements and reports in full XBRL format" MUST be reported.

Apabila pemfail memilih "Penerangan sama ada syarikat telah memohon sebarang pengecualian, pengenepian atau pelanjutan masa berkaitan dengan penyata tahunan atau penyata kewangan dan laporan daripada Pendaftar atau Menteri" sebagai "Ya" KEMUDIAN "Penerangan sama ada syarikat telah memohon pengecualian daripada pemfailan penuh penyata kewangan dan laporan mengikut format XBRL." MESTI dilaporkan.

When filer selects "Description on whether company had applied for any exemption, waiver, relief or extension of time with regards to annual return or financial statements and reports from Registrar or Minister" as "Yes" THEN "Description on whether company had applied to waive lodgement of financial statements by foreign company" MUST be reported.

Apabila pemfail memilih "Penerangan sama ada syarikat telah memohon sebarang pengecualian, pengenepian atau pelanjutan masa berkaitan dengan penyata tahunan atau penyata kewangan dan laporan daripada Pendaftar atau Menteri" sebagai "Ya" KEMUDIAN "Penerangan sama ada syarikat telah memohon untuk pengenepian serah simpan penyata kewangan oleh syarikat asing." MESTI dilaporkan.

When filer selects "Description on whether company had applied for any exemption, waiver, relief or extension of time with regards to annual return or financial statements and reports from Registrar or Minister" as "Yes" THEN "Description on whether company had applied for relief from requirements as to form and contents of Director's report" MUST be reported.

Apabila pemfail memilih "Penerangan sama ada syarikat telah memohon sebarang pengecualian, pengenepian atau pelanjutan masa berkaitan dengan penyata tahunan atau penyata kewangan dan laporan daripada Pendaftar atau Menteri" sebagai "Ya" KEMUDIAN "Penerangan sama ada syarikat telah memohon pengecualian berhubung kehendak dan keperluan butiran kandungan laporan pengarah." MESTI dilaporkan.

When filer selects "Description on whether company had applied for any exemption, waiver, relief or extension of time with regards to annual return or financial statements and reports from Registrar or Minister" as "Yes" THEN "Description on whether company had applied for relief from requirements as to form and contents of financial statements" MUST be reported.

Apabila pemfail memilih "Penerangan sama ada syarikat telah memohon sebarang pengecualian, pengenepian atau pelanjutan masa berkaitan dengan penyata tahunan atau penyata kewangan dan laporan daripada Pendaftar atau Menteri" sebagai "Ya" KEMUDIAN "Penerangan sama ada syarikat telah memohon pengecualian berhubung kehendak dan keperluan butiran kandungan penyata kewangan." MESTI dilaporkan.

When filer selects "Description on whether company had applied for any exemption, waiver, relief or extension of time with regards to annual return or financial statements and reports from Registrar or Minister" as "Yes" THEN "Description on whether company had applied for extension of time for circulation of financial statements and reports" MUST be reported.

Apabila pemfail memilih "Penerangan sama ada syarikat telah memohon sebarang pengecualian, pengenepian atau pelanjutan masa berkaitan dengan penyata tahunan atau penyata kewangan dan laporan daripada Pendaftar atau Menteri" sebagai "Ya" KEMUDIAN "Penerangan sama ada syarikat telah memohon untuk pelanjutan masa bagi edaran penyata kewangan dan laporan." MESTI dilaporkan.

When filer selects "Description on whether company had applied for any exemption, waiver, relief or extension of time with regards to annual return or financial statements and reports from Registrar or Minister" as "Yes" THEN "Description on whether company had applied for extension of time to lodge financial statements and reports" MUST be reported.

Apabila pemfail memilih "Penerangan sama ada syarikat telah memohon sebarang pengecualian, pengenepian atau pelanjutan masa berkaitan dengan penyata tahunan atau penyata kewangan dan laporan daripada Pendaftar atau Menteri" sebagai "Ya" KEMUDIAN "Penerangan sama ada syarikat telah memohon pelanjutan masa untuk serah simpan penyata kewangan dan laporan" MESTI dilaporkan.

When filer selects "Description on whether company had applied for any exemption, waiver, relief or extension of time with regards to annual return or financial statements and reports from Registrar or Minister" as "Yes" THEN "Description on whether company had applied for extension of time for holding annual general meeting" MUST be reported.

Apabila pemfail memilih "Penerangan sama ada syarikat telah memohon sebarang pengecualian, pengenepian atau pelanjutan masa berkaitan dengan penyata tahunan atau penyata kewangan dan laporan daripada Pendaftar atau Menteri" sebagai "Ya" KEMUDIAN "Penerangan sama ada syarikat telah memohon pelanjutan masa untuk edaran dan mengadakan mesyuarat agung tahunan." MESTI dilaporkan.

When filer selects "Description on whether company had applied for any exemption, waiver, relief or extension of time with regards to annual return or financial statements and reports from Registrar or Minister" as "Yes" THEN "Description on whether company had applied for extension of time to lodge annual return" MUST be reported.

Apabila pemfail memilih "Penerangan sama ada syarikat telah memohon sebarang pengecualian, pengenepian atau pelanjutan masa berkaitan dengan penyata tahunan atau penyata kewangan dan laporan daripada Pendaftar atau Menteri" sebagai "Ya" KEMUDIAN "Penerangan sama ada syarikat telah memohon pelanjutan masa untuk menyerah simpan penyata tahunan." MESTI dilaporkan.

When filer selects "Description on whether company had applied for any exemption, waiver, relief or extension of time with regards to annual return or financial statements and reports from Registrar or Minister" as "Yes" THEN "Description on whether company had applied any exemption, waiver, relief or extension of time with regards to annual return or financial statements and reports to Minister" MUST be reported.

Apabila pemfail memilih "Penerangan sama ada syarikat telah memohon sebarang pengecualian, pengenepian atau pelanjutan masa berkaitan dengan penyata tahunan atau penyata kewangan dan laporan daripada Pendaftar atau Menteri" sebagai "Ya" KEMUDIAN "Penerangan sama ada syarikat telah memohon apa-apa pengecualian, pengenepian atau pelanjutan masa berkaitan penyata tahunan atau penyata kewangan dan laporan kepada Menteri." MESTI dilaporkan.

When filer chooses from the dropdown of "Type of identification of director who signed certificate of exempt private company" as - MyKad/MyPR/ MyKAS THEN "Identification number of the director who signed certificate of exempt private company" should be 12 digit number

Apabila pemfail memilih daripada dropdown "Jenis pengenalan diri pengarah yang menandatangani perakuan berhubung syarikat persendirian terkecuali" sebagai - MyKad/MyPR/ MyKAS maka "Nombor pengenalan pengarah yang menandatangani perakuan syarikat swasta dikecualikan" hendaklah 12 digit nombor

When filer chooses from the dropdown of "Type of identification of company secretary who signed certificate of exempt private company" as - MyKad/MyPR/ MyKAS THEN "Identification number of the company secretary who signed certificate of exempt private company" should be 12 digit number

Apabila pemfail memilih dari dropdown "Jenis pengenalan diri setiausaha syarikat yang menandatangani perakuan berhubung syarikat persendirian terkecuali" sebagai - MyKad/MyPR/ MyKAS kemudian "Nombor pengenalan setiausaha syarikat yang menandatangani perakuan berhubung syarikat persendirian terkecuali" hendaklah nombor 12 digit
Kindly ensure the company is eligible to be under Audit Exempted criteria
Sila pastikan syarikat layak berada di bawah Audit Exempted Criteria

variable:precondition.test: $V1 eq 'Private company' and $V2 eq 'Unaudited' and $V4 eq 'First time preparation of financial statements after incorporation'

gen:link.msg:message: Kindly ensure the company is eligible to be under Audit Exempted criteria
Sila pastikan syarikat layak berada di bawah Audit Exempted Criteria

variable:precondition.test: $V1 eq 'Private company' and $V2 eq 'Unaudited' and $V4 eq 'Subsequent preparation of financial statements'

gen:link.msg:message: Kindly ensure the company is eligible to be under Audit Exempted criteria
Sila pastikan syarikat layak berada di bawah Audit Exempted criteria

variable:precondition.test: $V1 eq 'Public company' and $V2 eq 'Unaudited' and $V4 eq 'First time preparation of financial statements after incorporation'

gen:link.msg:message: Kindly ensure the company is eligible to be under Audit Exempted criteria
Sila pastikan syarikat layak berada di bawah Audit Exempted criteria

variable:precondition.test: $V1 eq 'Public company' and $V2 eq 'Unaudited' and $V4 eq 'Subsequent preparation of financial statements'
